imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Steam platform logo icon with transparent background (steam-logo.dim_64x64.png)
- Xbox platform logo icon with transparent background (xbox-logo.dim_64x64.png)
- PlayStation platform logo icon with transparent background (playstation-logo.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Replace all platform emoji icons with actual logo images: Steam logo for PC platform, Xbox logo for Xbox platform, PlayStation logo for PS4/PS5 platforms
Add white navigation arrows to the horizontally scrollable game rows to guide users on how to slide through games

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace emoji icons with actual platform logos (Steam, Xbox, PlayStation)
Add white navigation arrows to guide horizontal game sliding
